languages.text: "Когда узор приведет тебя к нему, он раздвоится — ибо нарушенный паттерн начинает идти рябью, множиться и искажать палитру. Что выберешь ты — принять Предел или обратить его в своего бога? Лишь смертный, достигнувший вершины просветления, сможет дать правильный ответ".

"When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."
languages.original_text: "Когда узор приведет тебя к нему, он раздвоится — ибо нарушенный паттерн начинает идти рябью, множиться и искажать палитру. Что выберешь ты — принять Предел или обратить его в своего бога? Лишь смертный, достигнувший вершины просветления, сможет дать правильный ответ".

traits.locale_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a disrupted pattern begins rippling, multiplying, and distorting its colours. What will you choose, accepting the Edge or turning it into your god? Only a mortal who has reached the top of enlightenment will be able to give a right answer."

"When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a disrupted pattern begins rippling, multiplying, and distorting its colours. What will you choose, accepting the Edge or turning it into your god? Only a mortal who has reached the top of enlightenment will be able to give a right answer."

"When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a disrupted pattern will ripple, multiply, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or turn it into your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the peak of enlightenment can answer this question."

"When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a disrupted pattern will ripple, multiply, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or turn it into your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the peak of enlightenment can answer this question."

"When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."

languages.text: “当预言的景象将你引向那里时，它会一分为二。那些被打乱的图案会不断荡漾、显现，扭曲本身的色彩。你是会接受锋刃？还是会将它视若神明？你会选择哪条道路？只有抵达悟道巅峰的凡人，才能找到答案。”
languages.original_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."

traits.locale_text: “当预言的景象将你引向那里时，它会一分为二。那些被打乱的图案会不断荡漾、显现，扭曲本身的色彩。你是会接受锋刃？还是会将它视若神明？你会选择哪条道路？只有抵达悟道巅峰的凡人，才能找到答案。”

languages.text: « Quand le motif vous aura {mf|mené|menée} là-bas, il se divisera en deux, car un motif perturbé ondule, se multiplie et altère ses couleurs. Accepter la Lame ou en faire votre dieu : que choisirez-vous ? Seul un mortel ayant atteint l'illumination saura répondre à cette question. »
languages.original_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."

traits.locale_text: « Quand le motif vous aura {mf|mené|menée} là-bas, il se divisera en deux, car un motif perturbé ondule, se multiplie et altère ses couleurs. Accepter la Lame ou en faire votre dieu : que choisirez-vous ? Seul un mortel ayant atteint l'illumination saura répondre à cette question. »

languages.text: 「お前をそこに導く時、紋様は二つに分かれるだろう。乱れた紋様はさざ波立ち、増殖し、その色を歪めるものだからだ。刃を受け容れるか、それを神と成すか…どちらを選ぶ？この問いに答えることができるのは、啓蒙の極みに至ったた人間だけだ」
languages.original_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."

traits.locale_text: 「お前をそこに導く時、紋様は二つに分かれるだろう。乱れた紋様はさざ波立ち、増殖し、その色を歪めるものだからだ。刃を受け容れるか、それを神と成すか…どちらを選ぶ？この問いに答えることができるのは、啓蒙の極みに至ったた人間だけだ」

languages.text: «Cuando la pauta te lleve allí, se dividirá en dos, puesto que una pauta interrumpida es dada a ondular, multiplicarse y deformar sus colores. Aceptar el Filo o convertirlo en tu dios... ¿qué elegirás? Solo un{mf||a} mortal que haya alcanzado la cúspide de la iluminación puede responder a esa pregunta».
languages.original_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la pauta te lleve allí, se dividirá en dos, puesto que una pauta interrumpida es dada a ondular, multiplicarse y deformar sus colores. Aceptar el Filo o convertirlo en tu dios... ¿qué elegirás? Solo un{mf||a} mortal que haya alcanzado la cúspide de la iluminación puede responder a esa pregunta».

languages.text: "Wenn das Muster Euch hinführt, teilt es sich auf, denn ein gestörtes Muster kräuselt sich, ehe es sich vervielfacht und seine Farben verzerrt. Akzeptiert den Rand oder macht ihn zu Eurem Gott ... wofür entscheidet Ihr Euch? Nur ein Sterblicher, der den Gipfel der Erleuchtung erreicht hat, kann die Antwort finden."
languages.original_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Muster Euch hinführt, teilt es sich auf, denn ein gestörtes Muster kräuselt sich, ehe es sich vervielfacht und seine Farben verzerrt. Akzeptiert den Rand oder macht ihn zu Eurem Gott ... wofür entscheidet Ihr Euch? Nur ein Sterblicher, der den Gipfel der Erleuchtung erreicht hat, kann die Antwort finden."

"Wenn das Muster Euch hinführt, teilt es sich in zwei, denn ein gestörtes Muster kräuselt, vervielfacht und verzerrt seine Farben. Akzeptiert den Rand oder verwandelt ihn in Euren Gott — was werdet Ihr wählen? Nur ein Sterblicher, der den Gipfel der Erleuchtung erreicht hat, kann diese Frage beantworten."

languages.text: "Örge seni oraya ulaştırdığında ikiye bölünecek zira bozulmuş bir örge; dalgalanır, çoğalır ve renk değiştirir. Yalım'ı kabul edebilir veya tanrın bilebilirsin... Hangisini seçeceksin? Cevaba yalnızca aydınlanmanın zirvesine ulaşmış bir ölümlü erişebilir."
languages.original_text: "When the pattern leads you there, it will split in two, for a pattern disrupted is wont to ripple, become manifold, and distort its colours. Accept the Edge or make it your god — which will you choose? Only a mortal who has reached the prime of enlightenment can find the answer."
